sentence.Network_en: You are hereby appointed Sub-Lieutenant RNVR of HMS Tartar.
sentence.Network_cn: 你被任命为皇家海军舰艇“鞑靼人”号的皇家海军志愿后备队中尉。

sentence.Network_en: We , the people of Indonesia, hereby declare Indonesia's independence.
sentence.Network_cn: 吾印度尼西亚公民特此宣布印度尼西亚独立.

sentence.Network_en: I hereby acknowledge receipt of your letter of 25 July.
sentence.Network_cn: 特此告知贵方7月25日的来函收悉.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... hereafter 今后 hereby 特此 hereditary 遗传的.
自考英语综合英语课文（1） ... testament n. 遗嘱 hereby adv. （正式）特此，藉此，兹 bequeath v. 立遗嘱（将……）赠与.
以h开头的英语英文单词 ... hereafter 将来,来世 hereby 因此,据此 hereditary 世袭的,遗传的.
hereafter 此后hereby 因heredity 遗传；继承；传统

I hereby resign my office ., 我特此辞职.

I hereby confirm all the information provided above is true and correct . I understand that I right to check and correct my personal information in the database of HKICO at any time .本人谨确认上述所提供资料均正确无讹，并明白本人有权查阅并更正于香港学界电脑组织资料库内有关本人之个人资料。

entry.def: You use hereby when officially or formally saying what you are doing.

example.ex: I hereby sentence you for life after all the charges against you have been proven true...
example.tran: 鉴于对你的所有指控都证明属实，我特此宣判你无期徒刑。

example.ex: You are hereby appointed Sub-Lieutenant RNVR of HMS Tartar...
example.tran: 你被任命为皇家海军舰艇“鞑靼人”号的皇家海军志愿后备队中尉。

sentences.sentence: "I hereby declare you man and wife"
